Title: The May 16 Notification is a great new milestone in the history of the development of Marxism-Leninism, it is the Manifesto of the Communist Party of the 1960s
Designer: Central Academy of Art and Design, Jinggangshan Corps (中央工艺美术学院，井冈山)
Notes: With "the Manifesto", the Communist Manifesto by Marx and Engels is meant. The caricatures crushed by the book: Peng Zhen, Lu Dingyi, ???, Liu Shaoqi, Deng Tuo, ???, ???. The unrecognized persons may be Tian Han, Wu Han and Liao Mosha, all involved in the group around Peng Zhen and the controversy about the play on Hai Rui.
Theme: Quotations from Chairman MaoCultural Revolution Campaigns (1966-1976)
